main event: A bright, fast-moving object was observed in Denver, Colorado on June 8, 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30 seconds with no sound emitted from the object., The object was described as having a light green glow., Observers noted that the object illuminated the ground area momentarily., One object was reported during the observation., The sighting was recorded by a civilian source.
witness description: observers reported seeing the object from their backyard while looking at the Big Dipper
